attributes.action: Plant fruit trees and other edible plants in public spaces
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It costs the same to manage fruit trees, nut trees and blackberries as it does for ornamental plants.

These free resources will be welcomed by all UK city dwellers.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Plant fruit trees and other edible plants in public spaces."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page12569.asp

Prime Minister's Office
